meanings.definition: A sweet cake or bread typically flavored with cinnamon and nuts, often served with coffee.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a slice of coffeecake with my morning coffee.
meanings.sent2: The bakery had a delicious selection of coffeecakes to choose from.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that eating coffeecake for breakfast was like having dessert first!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked coffeecake filled the kitchen, making it feel cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the coffeecake glistened under the warm morning sun.

meanings.definition: A type of cake that is suitable for eating with coffee.
meanings.sent1: The coffeecake was the perfect accompaniment to our afternoon coffee break.
meanings.sent2: She baked a moist and flavorful coffeecake for the office party.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to sneak a bite of the coffeecake when no one was looking!
meanings.sent4: The coffeecake stood out on the dessert table like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The rich aroma of the freshly brewed coffee mingled with the sweet scent of the coffeecake.
